QuestData.Title: Elder Charms of Good Fortune
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $n. I am privileged to offer you an excellent opportunity. Through the centuries, we've honed a method by which the very laws of chance themselves can be bent. With an Elder Charm of Good Fortune, valuable artifacts will find their way into your hands more frequently.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 90 Lesser Charms of Good Fortune.
